titleStmt.title: A brief commentary or exposition vpon the Gospel according to St John: wherein the text is explained, divers doubts are resolved, and many other profitable things hinted, that had been by former interpreters pretermitted. / By John Trappe, M. A. pastour of Weston upon Avon in Glocester-shire.
titleStmt.author: Trapp, John, 1601-1669.

titleStmt.title: A brief commentary or exposition vpon the Gospel according to St John: wherein the text is explained, divers doubts are resolved, and many other profitable things hinted, that had been by former interpreters pretermitted. / By John Trappe, M. publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G.M. for Iohn Bellamy, and are to be sold at his shop, at the signe of the three Golden-Lyons in Cornehill, near the Royall Exchange.,
